name: Airscape - The Fall of Gravity
summary: Airscape is a fast-paced, ultra-challenging 60 level action platformer. You play a deep-sea octopus, kidnapped by a mechanical alien race. Jump, dodge, and swim through a skybound environment full of floating islands, water formations, and robotic terrors.
info:
• 中文名: 空中美景：重力之旅
  • 平台: pc
  • 发行日期: 2015年8月12日
